searches.emptyText: Try to start a new search, you never know where it will lead
searches.noFilterLocationRadiusValue: Don't filter littens based on distance

favourites.title: Favourites

favourites.emptySearchesText: Save a frequent search criteria and they will show up in here

new.addLocationDescription: Select the location using the map
new.title: New litten

littenPost.cantOpenURL: It seems your device is unable to handle this action
littenPost.emptyContactOptions: It appears {{name}} has no contact options available at this moment. Why don't you add this litten to your favourites and check back later?
littenPost.selfContactOptions: This is your own litten! You can perform edits in your profile and settings tab.
littenPost.share: I think you might be interested in {{name}} ! Why don't you check it out on Litten ? {{uri}}

messages.emptyText: Start conversations and they will show up in here
messages.title: Messages

The app, its software and all content found on it are provided on an "as is" and "as available" basis. The team will not be liable for any loss, whether such loss is direct, indirect, special or consequential, suffered by any party as a result of their use of the app, its software or content. Any downloading or uploading of material to the app is done at the userâ€™s own risk and the user will be solely responsible for any damage to any computer system or loss of data that results from such activities. Should you encounter any bugs, glitches, lack of functionality or other problems on the app, please let us know immediately so we can rectify these accordingly. Your help in this regard is greatly appreciated.
profile.postsEmptyText: When you {{createOrArchive}} littens, they will show up in here
profile.viewEmptyUserPosts: This user doesn't have active littens at the moment.

edit.isOrganizationDesc: Set this option if you're using on behalf of an organization. It will label your profile as such and let other users know.

settings.contactCallDesc: Your phone number will be shared when someone is interested in your litten
settings.contactEmailDesc: Your email will be shared when someone is interested in your litten
settings.contactInAppDesc: This option preserves your privacy the most
settings.contactSMSDesc: Your phone number will be shared when someone is interested in your litten
settings.shareMetricsDesc: Analytics are anonymous and allow us to receive automated error reports which we use to improve the overall user experience.

maintenance.title: Under maintenance
maintenance.description: We're sorry about this inconvenience, but the app is currently under maintenance.

dev.hacksIntro: This is a developer-only screen with useful hacks
dev.storybookIntro: You can browse through Litten's UI Elements in this screen

forms.changePhotoDescription: Do you want to replace the current photo?
forms.mapInstructions: To change the location on the map, click and drag the marker to the desired position.
forms.name: Name
forms.recoverSentSuccess: Please follow the instructions on your email
forms.registrationTermsAndConditionsMessage: By proceeding to create an account and use Litten, you are agreeing to our Terms and Conditions and Privacy Policy.
forms.reportDisclaimer: The information you submit is completely anonymous. If you expect a response, please use another way to contact us.
forms.reportErrorMessage: Do you want to report this error?
forms.reportErrorMessageFail: Couldn't submit your feedback, please try again later
forms.reportHasExtraInfo: This report includes information about your conversation.

confirmMessages.clearForm: Are you sure you want to clear the form?
confirmMessages.confirmationEmail: Are you sure you want to verify your email?
confirmMessages.deleteConversation: Are you sure you want to delete the conversation with {{user}}?
confirmMessages.deleteLitten: Are you sure you want to delete the litten {{title}}?
confirmMessages.deleteProfile: All of your littens will be removed and this action is irreversible. Are you sure you want to delete your profile?
confirmMessages.enterPassword: Your password is required for this operation
confirmMessages.resetFilters: Are you sure you want to reset the filters?
confirmMessages.signOut: Are you sure you want to sign out of the app?

errorMessages.checkConnectionText: It seems you don't have an active internet connection.
errorMessages.invalidEmail: Email should be in a valid format
errorMessages.invalidLittenLocation: It would really help to know where your litten is!
errorMessages.invalidLittenPhoto: Consider adding, at least, one photo
errorMessages.invalidLittenSpecies: Tell us what species is your litten!
errorMessages.invalidLittenStory: Why not tell us a bit more about your litten?
errorMessages.invalidLittenTitle: Your litten must have a name, no?
errorMessages.invalidLittenType: Tell us why you're creating a new litten
errorMessages.invalidLocation: The provided location is invalid, try choosing another or use a different method
errorMessages.invalidPassword: Password should have, at least, 10 characters
errorMessages.invalidPhoneNumber: Phone number should be in a valid format
errorMessages.littenPostMissing: It seems there is a problem with this litten!
errorMessages.newUnverifiefEmail: You need to verify your email address before you can create a new litten! This can be done in your profile definitions.
errorMessages.noPhoneNumber: You haven't specified a phone number yet, but you can do so in your profile
errorMessages.profileUnverifiefEmail: Your email has not been verified. Click here to resend a confirmation email.
errorMessages.profileUnverifiefEmailError: Could not verify your email at this time.
errorMessages.profileUnverifiefEmailSent: A confirmation email has been sent to the provided email. Please, check both your inbox and spam folders.

system.allowLocation: Turn on Location Services to allow {{appName}} to determine your location

firebaseErrorMessages.auth/too-many-requests: Access to this account has been temporarily disabled due to many failed login attempts. You can immediately restore it by resetting your password or you can try again later.
firebaseErrorMessages.auth/user-not-found: There is no such existing user record

easterEggs.placeholder: If you're seeing this, you are a very special person. This is a development placeholder and should have been removed from the final build.
easterEggs.simulation: We're inside a huge simulation chamber on an alien spaceship.
easterEggs.tribute: This is not The Greatest Post in the World, no. This is just a preview.
